profileAlternative.name: Liza (Kostinskaya) Haskell
profileAlternative.headline: General Counsel at Tide
profileAlternative.summary: I'm new to London and would love to meet other in-house professionals, so do not hesitate to reach out!

aboutAlternative.text: I'm new to London and would love to meet other in-house professionals, so do not hesitate to reach out!

positions.title: Head of Legal
positions.description:
Gusto's first legal hire. Scaled the company and its processes through a period of accelerating growth (growing EE count from ~100 to ~900). Grew legal team to ten professionals. My responsibilities included:

• General Corporate: Managed financings and other equity-related transactions; maintained the capitalization table and applicable records; created and implemented corporate governance policies
• Commercial Agreements: Drafted and negotiated a wide variety of agreements, including partner agreements, professional services agreements, commercial leases, software license agreements and SaaS agreements.
• Compliance: Ensured compliance with relevant legislation and regulations applicable to different aspects of the business, including privacy, health insurance and money transmission
• IP Portfolio Management: Oversaw and grew the company's IP portfolio and supervised various copyright, license and trademark issues
• Litigation: Facilitated dispute settlement and responded to possible threats in a variety of matters including vendor disagreements and employment matters
• Risk Management and Advice: Provided business and legal risk advisory across a large number of subject areas, including business development, employment and labor issues, corporate governance and fraud
• Legal Team Oversight: Oversaw and mentored a team of 10 legal professionals and interns
• Outside Counsel Management: Collaborated with and directed outside counsel to effectively manage the various risks and on-going transactions
…
see more

positions.title: Corporate Associate
positions.description:
• Start-up: Supported over 30 emerging companies in the technology and life science industries at all stages, from incorporation to pre-liquidity event
• Fundraising: Represented companies and investors in equity financings and venture debt financings
• Securities: Assisted with initial public offerings, follow-on offerings, large public debt transactions and provided public company support
• M&A: Experience with seller- and buy-side acquisitions.
…
see more

positions.title: Business Development and Legal Associate
positions.description:
• Provided legal support to a successful video game company in conjunction with its outside attorneys
• Drafted a variety of complex contracts, including publishing, licensing and distribution agreements
• Completed a wide range of intellectual property and business development assignments
